content: On the evening of June 18, after the Chinese Super League match between Meizhou Hakka and Shanghai Port, fans at the Meizhou Hakka home stadium surrounded the referee because they questioned the referee's decision to record Shanghai Port's handball as a valid goal.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"Chinese Doctor"
Yu Li, a teacher at Southern Medical University who was punished for being late for class due to rescuing a sick child, has been suspended from the hospital after being widely reported by the media.
ğŸ‘

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
@wuaobei I am more inclined to believe that they are deliberately directing the topic of public opinion to international students.
Because in fact, whether Chinese or international students, if the teacher does not show up at the class time, they will definitely report and ask. And the decision on how to determine the severity of the incident and how to deal with it is all up to the school and the hospital.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"Reproductive isolation"
The Paper reported that a survey showed that in the Northeast region, marriage within the system has become an unwritten rule. Single young people who have not entered the system, even if they have superior conditions, find it difficult to develop long-term intimate relationships with single young people within the system.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
At 8:28 on June 19, a knife attack occurred at Hechuan Station on Shanghai Metro Line 9, injuring three people. The suspect (male, 54 years old) has been arrested by the police and the case is under further investigation.
According to official news from Shanghai Metro, in order to cooperate with external disposal, Hechuan Road Station on Line 9 was temporarily closed, and operations resumed normal at around 9:16.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 19, Yu Qi, the "diplomatic immunity sister", apologized for her inappropriate words and deeds, saying: "I will deeply reflect on everyone and sincerely accept criticism from all sides."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 18, in Nanchang, Jiangxi Province, an e-commerce company complained that a customer bought exercise vouchers and displayed them as gifts at their wedding, and then refunded and returned the vouchers after the wedding.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 14, Harbin College professor Guo Qiuping posted a video saying that she mainly studies the Jewish history of Harbin and was beaten by the college's vice president Sun Hongyi when she was working on a national scientific research project. She also said that the other party "actually became a municipal people's congress representative despite having a criminal record." Not only that, Sun Hongyi also withheld national scientific research funds.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the afternoon of the 18th, Xi Jinping inspected and investigated in Qinghai Province. He first visited the Guoluo Xining National Middle School and Hongjue Temple in Xining City to learn about the local efforts to deepen the east-west cooperation and targeted support in education, strengthen the education of building a strong sense of community for the Chinese nation, and the Tibetan Buddhist community's promotion of the fine tradition of patriotism and love for religion, and promote national unity and progress.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 17, Shuanghe Township of Weixin County, Yunnan Province, released a letter to migrant workers, in which they were reminded that they should deal with economic disputes rationally, not illegally demand wages, safeguard their legitimate rights and interests in accordance with the law, and not take extreme actions.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 19, at the graduation ceremony of Fudan University Law School, a graduate went on stage and punched the dean.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The student then published an article on WeChat Moments, pointing out that Fudan University has a bad and corrupt learning atmosphere, a corrupt system, and a foul official atmosphere. He also said that he did not choose to study at Fudan voluntarily, but purely because of his parents' expectations, so he had no reason to complete his studies.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
In the early morning of June 18, a major criminal case occurred in Ershijia Village, Hohhot City, Inner Mongolia, and five people were killed. According to local residents: The murderer was usually very honest because the victims occupied his land.
It is said on the Internet that the young man killed five people, who were usually very honest, because the people he killed occupied his land, a land dispute issue.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Subsequent supplement: The wrong person was hit.
The student then apologized to the teacher who was hit in WeChat Moments.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
June 19, Jiangyin, Jiangsu. It was reported online that Sunshine Group went bankrupt and owed employees salaries and fundraising funds. A large number of employees defended their rights at the company, and the deputy mayor mediated on the spot.
According to reports, on June 13, ST Sunshine fell to the limit for 28 consecutive trading days, and its share price fell to 0.37 yuan. ST Sunshine announced that on June 13, it had received the "Preliminary Notice of Termination of Listing" from the Shanghai Stock Exchange. ST Sunshine will become the first stock to be delisted in the photovoltaic industry this year.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The most difficult 618 in history 
On June 19, it was reported that this year's 618 e-commerce festival, Xiao Yangge and Dongfang Zhenxuan did not make the top ten sales list, and all participants showed a sense of "exhaustion". 
A furniture dealer said, "The more you sell during the promotion, the more you lose. I don't know about some big merchants and big brands. Now, small and medium-sized sellers like us have basically given up the promotion."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On June 19, an "Administrative Penalty Notice" issued by the Xi'an Municipal Bureau of Justice sparked controversy.
The penalty notice showed that Liu Tao, director of Shanxi Zunben Law Firm, bribed the wife of a judge for 300,000 yuan. Because he actively cooperated with the investigation and confessed the problem, he played a key role in solving major cases. After collective research, it was determined that the amount of bribery was relatively small, and the case was not transferred to the procuratorate, and a penalty of suspending his practice for six months was imposed.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At around 1 p.m. on the 19th, the suspension rope on one side of the suspension bridge in the Xiata Scenic Area in Zhaosu County, Yili, Xinjiang broke. The scenic area responded: the rope was not broken, the cause was being investigated, and no one was injured at the moment.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 19, Jiaxing, Zhejiang. A medical accident occurred at Haining Hospital. On that day, when the family members were defending their rights in the hospital, they questioned the hospital leaders, "Others paid money, and you gave the experts to others. We don't pay money, and you use interns to treat us. Is this fair?" After that, the conflict escalated, and the family members and onlookers demanded an "apology" in unison. The police arrived and covered the scene with black cloth.

content:
On June 18, in Kaiyuan, Liaoning, a man posted a video saying that his car and cell phone were robbed and he was beaten to a bloody pulp.
However, no one cared when he went to the police station or the municipal government.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
It is said online that the student is Taiwanese.
Previously, he wrote swear words on the final exam paper and brought a mobile phone to cheat in the hope of being expelled, but failed.
In addition, during the epidemic, the student was dissatisfied with the epidemic prevention policy, smoking without wearing a mask in the place where the calculation was done, and climbing over the wall to travel to Chengdu during the school quarantine.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: In April this year, the student appeared on the list of candidates for admission to Peking University School of Medicine.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Later, the school security office said the student had been taken away by the police and the teacher had gone to see a doctor.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 19, CCTV reported on the news of waterlogging in the Wuyi Mountain Scenic Area in Fujian. Netizens complained that the video was staged because the water in the video was very shallow and the water was connected inside and outside, so there was no point in throwing water outside.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 18, Xingtai, Hebei. Ningjin County Hongqi Mingcheng real estate project delayed delivery, the developer gave the reason that force majeure factors affected the project construction progress. Owners came to the Ningjin County government to hang banners to protect their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 18, Weihai, Shandong. Weihai Yinxin collapsed after absorbing a large amount of private deposits, and investors gathered to defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 18, Dazhou, Sichuan. The developer of Luofu Shanshui Meidi Community has not opened the basement exit 2 for 4 years since the delivery of the houses, and has collected property taxes but not issued property certificates. This caused dissatisfaction among the owners, who gathered together to defend their rights, and a physical conflict broke out between the two sides.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 17, Yake City, Inner Mongolia. Xinmao Real Estate Company has been in arrears of wages for workers for four years, and the workers reported it under their real names to demand their wages.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Hot news: Soldiers and veterans who want to enter Tiananmen Square must be strictly inspected by security.
